# poorman

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of poorman is to provide base R versions of `dplyr` functions. Check out the blog post [here](http://127.0.0.1:4321/2020/02/15/building-a-base-dplyr-with-primitives/) for more details.

## Installation

You can install the released version of poorman from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("poorman")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("nathaneastwood/poorman")
```
